input:
Alice, Bob, and Claire are playing a game. At the start of the game, they are each holding a ball: Alice has a green ball, Bob has a purple ball, and Claire has a blue ball.
As the game progresses, pairs of players trade balls. First, Bob and Alice swap balls. Then, Claire and Bob swap balls. Finally, Bob and Alice swap balls. At the end of the game, Bob has the
Options:
(A) green ball
(B) purple ball
(C) blue ball
